sentences.en: After the Finalize method is executed, its reference will be removed from the ToBeFinalizaed queue.
sentences.cn: 只有当此对象的Finalize方法被执行完毕后, 其引用才会从待结束队列中移除.

sentences.en: But if you lose your audience with technical explanations, you'll never get to what you want: a resolution so you can finalize your design.
sentences.cn: 但是如果您用技术性的解释使受众迷惑，则您永远得不到希望达到的目的：完成设计的解决办法。

sentences.en: Franck and his crew had arrived to finalize all the details of the wedding.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克和他的助手来这准备把婚礼的细节都定下来.

sentences.en: I be glad we have at last finalize this deal.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴,终于圆满成交了.
我需要把这个提议定案.

sentences.en: I'd like to meet again in a week to finalize this contract.
sentences.cn: 我想下星期再开一次会把这份合约敲定.

sentences.en: I'll call him as soon as we finalize the itinerary.
sentences.cn: 我们把日程确定下后,我马上给他打电话.

sentences.en: I'll finalize that appointment with her.
sentences.cn: 我会跟她最后落实这一约会.

sentences.en: Jo flew out to Thailand to finalize the details of the deal.
sentences.cn: 乔乘飞机去往泰国，敲定这笔生意的具体事宜。

sentences.en: Let's meet again tomorrow to finalize the price.
sentences.cn: 我们明天再见面最后敲定价格.

sentences.en: Negotiators from the three countries finalized the agreement in August.
sentences.cn: 3个国家的谈判代表在8月最终确定了协议。

sentences.en: Review and finalize the annual clearance of Corporation Income Tax.
sentences.cn: 审定企业所得税汇算清缴.

sentences.en: The money was given in earnest to finalize the contract.
sentences.cn: 这笔钱是作为敲定合同的定金.

sentences.en: The negotiators struggled to finalize a deal.
sentences.cn: 谈判参加者努力做成一笔交易.

sentences.en: Turn the riband around. Finalize the design of cross.
sentences.cn: 把花结反过来, 织十字架定型,就织好了.

sentences.en: We are saying nothing until all the details have been finalized.
sentences.cn: 在所有细节最终确定之前我们无可奉告。

sentences.en: We need to finalize the next product launch.
sentences.cn: 我们需要最后确定新产品的推出.

sentences.en: You will need to finalize important deals this week.
sentences.cn: 本周需要做一下重要的总结工作.

words.tran_cn: 最终的；决定性的；不可更改的
决赛；期末考试；当日报纸的末版
结局；终曲；最后一场；最后乐章；尾声
定局；终结；结尾；最后的事物；最后的言行

trans.tran_cn: 完成， 结束； 最终确定
trans.tran_en: If you finalize something such as a plan or an agreement, you complete the arrangements for it, especially by discussing it with other people
